title: The Smithsonian Collection of Newspaper Comics
description: A collection of the most critically acclaimed American comic strips, from Yellow Kid of 1896 to such admired contemporary works as Peanuts, B.C. and Doonesbury. Old favourites Katzenjammer Kids, Mutt and Jeff, Gasoline Alley, Bringing up Father, Mickey Mouse, Little Orphan Annie, Dick Tracy, L'il Abner, Barnaby, Pogo and many more fill this collection of American comic classics.
author: Bill Blackbeard
